argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | resvsca.r | |- R = ( W |`v A ) |
| 2 |  | resvsca.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 3 |  | resvsca.b | |- B = ( Base ` F ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_resvval | |- ( ( W e. X /\ A e. Y ) -> R = if ( B C_ A , W , ( W sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( F |`s A ) >. ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_iftrue | |- ( B C_ A -> if ( B C_ A , W , ( W sSet <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , ( F |`s A ) >. ) ) = W ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylan9eqr | |- ( ( B C_ A /\ ( W e. X /\ A e. Y ) ) -> R = W ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_3impb | |- ( ( B C_ A /\ W e. X /\ A e. Y ) -> R = W ) |
